chunk:
BIOS Organics Natural CBD Refresh Face Cleanser

Brand: BIOS Organics

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 0405-BIOS Organics Natural CBD Refresh Face Cleanser

chunk: Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate/Sebacate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate/Caprate, Glyceryl Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Extract*, Cannabidiol (CBD), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract*, Saccharide Isomerate, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Punica
book: 0405-BIOS Organics Natural CBD Refresh Face Cleanser

chunk: Glyceryl Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Extract*, Cannabidiol (CBD), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract*, Saccharide Isomerate, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
book: 0405-BIOS Organics Natural CBD Refresh Face Cleanser

chunk:
Directions: Morning and evening, pump into clean hands and lather. Massage over face and neck, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Warnings: Keep out of reach of children and pets. Do not ingest orally.
book: 0405-BIOS Organics Natural CBD Refresh Face Cleanser
